title: The Bad Boy of Science: Episode 3
description:
Dr of particle physics from the university of Cambridge and CERN/LHC. We had a great chat on how to apply a scientific perspective to current issues
*Note: had some problems with the spilt screen, working on it...
Follow him here:

twitter: @Samuel_Gregson 
Instagram: @thebadboyofscience
youtube: www.youtube.com/channel/UCXOB7vHKNz6NpEVx3JuTjKA
website: www.badboyofscience.com

follow me on:
twitter: @theother_95
instagram: @theother95
facebook: @theother95page

email me at theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
